Issue.creator: jimthematrix
Issue.summary: Block events seem to be sent pre-maturely before they get committed to the ledger
Issue.description: when writing the end-to-end.js that tests the transaction event listeners using the new event hub implementation, I noticed that step 2 which invokes the chaincode that was just deployed always results in "target chaincode not found" error. It seems as though the previous deploy transaction has not been finalized despite the BLOCK event. I had to introduce a 2 second delay before going to the next step of using the transaction that was just received.
